summary: Chronicles the trials and tribulations of Oribe, the successor to tea-master Rikyu, Usu, his gardener, and Princess Goh, who attempt to balance artistic expression and duty amid political intrigue in feudal Japan.
cast: Rie Miyazawa|Tatsuya Nakadai|Toshiya Nagasawa|Kôshirô Matsumoto|Rentarô Mikuni|Kyôko Enami|Hisashi Igawa|Kei Suma|Kei Yamamoto|Kyôko Maya|Tetsuya Bessho|Tokue Hanazawa|Yasushi Higuchi|Yûsuke Kawazu|Akira Nagoya|Katsuhiro Oida
title: Basara
